etymology.description: 歺(歺) (è, "bone remnants") + 又(又) (yòu, "hand") = hand handling bone remnants
etymology.interpretation: The character 𣦻 combines 歺(歺) (è, "bone remnants") with 又(又) (yòu, "hand") to depict a hand working with bone remnants, which is closely related to its use as a phonetic component in other characters, such as 餐(餐) (cān, "meal").
